import React from "react"; import { Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Form } from "antd"; import Link from "next/link"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; const dummy = { nickname: "hwan", Post: [], Followings: [], Followers: [] }; const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { return (
나비넷 프로필 짹짹
{dummy.Post.length}
,
팔로잉
{dummy.Followings.length}
,
팔로워
{dummy.Followers.length}
]} > {dummy.nickname[0]}} title={dummy.nickname} />


{children} 세번째 ); }; AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node }; export default AppLayout;
